Flyshop

Our free and premium services

The Flying Nerds offers a large variety of free and premium workshops to explore the world of drones via zoom video calls.

Services

Beginner

We meet once week, online, to get you acquainted with the basics of a drone and provide you with the confidence to get you started. It is free and friendly.

Free to attend*

Intermediate

On this zoom call, every Tuesday, the attendees usually and already owns a drone. We give you advanced tips on customised drones.

Attendance on Request*

Advanced

Once a month, we received a professionnel that makes a a living out of flying drones to discuss his experience and hardware used.

Attendance on Request*

Schools

We offer onsite workshops with one of our educators. Please contact us for more details.

Attendance on Request*

* Please use the form on the contact page. We have a dedicated team to assist you.
